title: How do you see Organon
content:
Hi!  
I am suggesting a typeface for my friend to use on a project. It should reflect the characteristics of education and co-operation in China. I found Organon [http://tinyurl.com/yz89lfc](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020141951/http:/tinyurl.com/yz89lfc "http://tinyurl.com/yz89lfc") - and I like it, what do you say about it?
author: Miro
